content: The poorest man may in his cottage bid defiance to all the forces of the Crown. It may be frail — its roof may shake — the wind may blow through it — the storm may enter — the rain may enter — but the King of England cannot enter — all his force dares not cross the threshold of the ruined tenement!
translations: ita:L'uomo più povero può, nel suo cottage, offrire una sfida a tutte le forze della Corona. Può essere fragile — il suo tet
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Scott (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
